committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Mining and Natural Resources

official_title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to provide for public interest improvements in the management of federal coal resources, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Federal Coal Equity Act of 1991 - Amends the Mineral Leasing Act to prohibit the Secretary of the Interior from issuing any coal lease: (1) if its issuance would have a significant adverse effect on coal produced from private lands due to the displacement of such coal from historical markets; or (2) to any entity engaged in coal production in a foreign country, or engaged in the importation of such coal into the United States.

titles.title: To amend the Mineral Leasing Act to provide for public interest improvements in the management of federal coal resources, and for other purposes.
